截至 2023.2, 有哪些你爱不释手的效率工具?( pc mac 均可,收费免费均可)

DvorakDwarf /

      Infinite-Storage-Glitch---ISG lets you use YouTube as cloud storage for ANY files, not just video

amazon-science /

      mm-cot---Official implementation for "Multimodal Chain-of-Thought Reasoning in Language Models" (stay tuned and more will be updated)

mjl- /

      mox---modern full-featured open source secure mail server for low-maintenance self-hosted email

dair-ai /

      Prompt-Engineering-Guide---🐙 Guides, papers, lecture, and resources for prompt engineering

AmbientRun /

      Ambient---The multiplayer game engine

Atmosphere-NX /

      Atmosphere---Atmosphère is a work-in-progress customized firmware for the Nintendo Switch.

microsoft /

      LMOps---General technology for enabling AI capabilities w/ LLMs and Generative AI models

o-oconnell /

      minixfromscratch---Development and compilation setup for the book version of MINIX (3.1.0) on QEMU

CTCaer /

      hekate---hekate - A GUI based Nintendo Switch Bootloader

lupantech /

      ScienceQA---Data and code for NeurIPS 2022 Paper "Learn to Explain: Multimodal Reasoning via Thought Chains for Science Question Answering".

ann-afame /

      DEVOPS-WORLD---

MysticFoxDE /

      WINDOWS-OPTIMIZATIONS---SKRIPTS FOR WINDOWS DESUBOPTIMIZATION

motion-canvas /

      motion-canvas---Visualize Complex Ideas Programmatically

flutter /

      packages---A collection of useful packages maintained by the Flutter team

poteto /

      hiring-without-whiteboards---⭐️ Companies that don't have a broken hiring process

microsoft /

      BioGPT---

itwanger /

      toBeBetterJavaer---一份通俗易懂、风趣幽默的Java学习指南，内容涵盖Java基础、Java并发编程、Java虚拟机、Java企业级开发、Java面试等核心知识点。学Java，就认准Java 程序员进阶之路😄

camenduru /

      stable-diffusion-webui-colab---stable diffusion webui colab

howl-anderson /

      unlocking-the-power-of-llms---使用 Prompts 和 Chains 让 ChatGPT 成为神奇的生产力工具！每日更新～

DovAmir /

      awesome-design-patterns---A curated list of software and architecture related design patterns.

jlevy /

      the-art-of-command-line---Master the command line, in one page

hashicorp /

      terraform-provider-aws---Terraform AWS provider

f /

      awesome-chatgpt-prompts---This repo includes ChatGPT prompt curation to use ChatGPT better.

DataLinkDC /

      dinky---Dinky is an out of the box one-stop real-time computing platform dedicated to the construction and practice of Unified Streaming & Batch and Unified Data Lake & Data Warehouse. Based on Apache Flink, Dinky provides the ability to connect many big data frameworks including OLAP and Data Lake.

ethereum /

      go-ethereum---Official Go implementation of the Ethereum protocol
